reasoning: Acute cystitis and urethritis incidence estimated at ~2850 per 100k person-years globally, with significant variation by gender (women ~5000-6000 per 100k, men ~500-1000 per 100k). Using incidence as these are acute infections with defined onsets. Based on multiple epidemiological studies and prevalence surveys.
source: Nicolle LE et al. (2005). Infectious Diseases Society of America guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of asymptomatic bacteriuria in adults. Clin Infect Dis. 40(5):643-654
